description:
An open-source system-wide ad-blocker and privacy guard.


What's New
- no-doomscroll
  Zen now ships with no-doomscroll â€“ a set of filter lists that remove infinite feeds from social media websites, letting you use them without getting pulled into endless scrolling. You can enable them under Filter lists / Digital wellbeing. Learn more on the no-doomscroll homepage.
- Other minor improvements.
Thank you for using Zen!
Full Changelog: v0.17.0...v0.18.0
